description: MARS documents can be generated using the Mars Project PDFXML plug-in for Adobe Acrobat, which was formerly available from the Adobe Labs website. However, the Mars Project has been discontinued and the plug-in is no longer available.
NOTE: The MARS file format developed by the Adobe Labs Mars Project is referred to as PDFXML. The .PDFXML file extension can be used interchangeably with the MARS extension.
